results.title: Tiger Woods and son Charlie share the lead at PNC Championship
creator: Sajjadkk
results.description: ORLANDO, Florida: Tiger Woods and 15-year-old son Charlie ran off five straight birdies on the back nine Saturday for a 13-under 59 in the scramble format, giving them a share of the lead in the PNC Championship in Woods’ first competition since back surgery in September.Woods said he scheduled that surgery — the sixth on his lower back in the last 10 years — to be sure he recovered in time to play with his son for the fifth straight year.

results.title: Usyk beats Fury in heavyweight championship rematch
creator: rbksa
results.description: RIYADH: Ukrainian heavyweight boxer Oleksandr Usyk takes the crown again in a rematch with British heavyweight boxer Tyson Fury, retaining the “undisputed” title.The rematch took place at Riyadh’s Kingdom Arena on Saturday evening. Usyk was awarded the fight 116-112 in favor by all three judges, handing Fury his second loss.Usyk’s win takes him to 23-0 with 14 knockouts and extends one of the all-time best careers that includes Olympic gold and undisputed champion at cruiserweight.
